Issue.creator: yelvxiuge
Issue.summary: eca.cert.chain: no such file or directory
Issue.description: WARN 05e Currently system chaincode does support security(noop,github.com/hyperledger/fabric/bddtests/syschaincode/noop) 2, ./peer network login jim 3, ./peer chaincode deploy -n mycc -c '{ "Args" : "init", "a","100", "b", "200" }' Error: Error building chaincode: rpc error: code = 5 desc = open /var/hyperledger/production/crypto/client/ks/raw/eca.cert.chain: no such file or directory >
